page.title: 04HOBBIES
page.content: In 1985 the most popular hobbies in our area were gardening,reading, knitting and sewing.Less popular ones included stamp collecting,and round the house hobbies such as decorating and silver work.People spent up to six hours weekly on their hobby.They chose these hobbies because they found them interesting or enjoyable.A few people chose them because they were usefull to them such as for making clothes.Most people have had their hobbies for many years (between 30 & 40).Only five people have had their hobby for less then ten years.Most people get the things for their hobbies from shops, but a few get stamps and books from the library and stamp fairs. Most people had not changed hobbies but some of the people had because they had grown out of them.
